info.title: CanAccesible APIs
info.description:
API collection for the Canaccesible platform. A system for reporting and managing accessibility issues in the Canary Islands.

This project uses two different environments:
- Development - Base URL: http://localhost:85/api
- Production - Base URL: https://canaccesible.es/api

post.description: Logs in a user using email/password (Basic Auth). Validates against LDAP, generates JWT, creates a session, and logs the action.
Logs out the user, destroys the session cookie, and logs the action.
Creates a new user with an optional profile image.
